field.name: summary
field.value: Don't make IList property setters public

field.name: description
field.value:
Setters for relation collection properties should not be public.. eg. instead of the following code
Public Overridable Property Orders() As IList(Of Order) Get Return Me._orders End Get Set Me._orders = value End Set End Property
The setter should be made Protected like so:
Public Overridable Property Orders() As IList(Of Order) Get Return Me._orders End Get Protected Set Me._orders = value End Set End Property
That way inheritors and NHibernate can still set the field but everyone else can't.
